title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
**Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black: Your Ultimate Coffee Companion!**

Are you ready to elevate your morning routine? The Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is here to deliver the perfect cup of coffee, any time, any day. With its sleek and modern design, this compact coffee maker is not just a machineâ€”it's a statement piece for your kitchen!

**Key Features That Make It Perfect for You:**

- **Versatile Brew Sizes:** Choose between 6, 8, or 10 ounces of coffee, perfect for any time of the day. Brew your coffee in under a minute, making it the ideal solution for a quick start to your day.
  
- **Bottle-Necked Water Reservoir:** With a 36 oz capacity, this coffee maker ensures you can keep brewing long after your initial fill. Plus, the removable reservoir makes cleaning a breeze!

- **Smart Start Technology:** Start your coffee in advance, and it will be ready just as you need it. The Smart Start feature allows you to program the brew time, giving you the perfect cup without the wait.

- **Button Controls for Precision:** Enjoy precise control with our easy-to-use button controls. Make adjustments on the go and achieve the perfect brew every time.

- **Energy-Efficient Design:** This coffee maker is designed to save energy without compromising on performance. The auto-off feature with a 2-hour timer ensures you save on electricity while keeping your coffee fresh.

- **Removable Drip Tray:** Say goodbye to messes! The removable drip tray makes cleanup simple and easy. Plus, it can accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches in height, and it holds accidental brews, making it a lifesaver in the kitchen.

- **Hot Water Dispense Option:** Not just for coffee! This machine also dispenses hot water, perfect for tea, soup, or even warming up your favorite oatmeal.

- **Compact and Sleek:** Measuring just 8 inches wide, this coffee maker fits seamlessly into any kitchen countertop, whether you're in a small apartment or a larger kitchen.

- **Compatible with K-Cup Pods and My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter:** Brew with your favorite K-Cup pods or the versatile Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, giving you endless options to customize your perfect brew.

Don't just wake up; wake up to a better morning with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Order now and experience the perfect cup of coffee at your fingertips!
